sys_atf_test.description:
Keywords: Onestream, Approval, Approve, Access, Request Description: Validate onestream approval process below. Before approved Approval = requested State = Pending Approval Assignment Group = Blank Correct Short Description No Task Generated
After approved Approval = Approved State= Open Assignment Group Populated Approval Doc'd in History Task(s) Generated
Complete Tasks RITM Approval = Approved State= Open Assignment Group Populated Approval Doc'd in History RITM Closed REQ Closed

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_atf_test"><sys_atf_test action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copied_from display_value="TC - 283 - Request - OneStream Approval - IT">94b6cf481b0fcd1062e50ed2cd4bcb9d</copied_from><description>Keywords: Onestream, Approval, Approve, Access, Request
Description: Validate onestream approval process below.
Before approved
	Approval = requested
	State = Pending Approval
	Assignment Group = Blank
	Correct Short Description
	No Task Generated

After approved
	Approval = Approved
	State= Open
	Assignment Group Populated
	Approval Doc'd in History
	Task(s) Generated

Complete Tasks
	RITM Approval = Approved
	State= Open
	Assignment Group Populated
	Approval Doc'd in History
	RITM Closed
	REQ Closed</description><enable_parameterized_testing>false</enable_parameterized_testing><name>TC - 283 - Request - OneStream Approval - IT copy</name><parameters/><remember/><sys_class_name>sys_atf_test</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-29 15:36:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>a6e50bdb1bc3cd908c5143f3cc4bcb28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TC - 283 - Request - OneStream Approval - IT copy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="OneStream Access Request" source="x_apig_onestream_a">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OneStream Access Request">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_atf_test_a6e50bdb1bc3cd908c5143f3cc4bcb28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-29 15:36:23</sys_updated_on></sys_atf_test><sys_variable_value action="delete_multiple" query="document_key=a6e50bdb1bc3cd908c5143f3cc4bcb28"/></record_update>
